Recipe.title: Crêpes
Recipe.Description: After trying a few recipes, we found this one to be the easiest to make and it tastes great.

section.instruction: Put Eggs, Milk, Water and Vanilla in a blender and mix on lowest setting.
While mixing, add Sugar, Salt and Baking Powder.
While still mixing, slowly add Flour.

Preheat a non-stick, 6-inch frying pan on medium heat.
(You may want to spray with some non-stick spray.)
Pour about 2 Tablespoons of batter into pan, then tip and turn the pan until bottom is coated.
Cook until slight bubbles form. The bottom should turn a light golden brown.
Turn Crêpe over and cook until other side is a light golden brown.

Notes.note: We like to spread syrup or jam on one side, then roll up into a loose tube before eating.

For a real treat:
Put a few spoonfuls of fruit pie filling on flat Crêpe.
Roll it up.
Cover with syrup.
Top it with whipped cream.
